Thescelosaurus

Thescelosaurus is a small ornithopod from the Cretaceous period. It was one of the last dinosaurs to walk the planet before the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event.

Paleo Chronicles

Thescelosaurus was 8 – 13 feet long and weighed 200 – 300 kilograms. It had a slender, light body with sturdy hind limbs and small wide arms. It was probably a herbivore but it could have potentially feasted on small animals as well. It is considered is to a fast and agile creature that would have preferred to live along streams and rivers.

In Game Attributes

Thescelosaurus is very fast and easy to hide. It can inhabit small caves due to its slender build and it is not affected by the swamp’s speed debuff as well. It has low health and damage so they should avoid altercations with predators at all cost.

Preferred Biomes

  • Hushed Forests
  • Ancient Woods
  • Grand River
  • Carnian Swamps
